text: Bathybuccinum yadai is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Buccinidae, the true whelks. ==Description== ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off Japan. ==References== * Fraussen K. & Chino, M., 2009. - The deep-water genera Bathybuccinum and Ovulatibuccinum Golikov & Sirenko, 1988 (Gastropoda: Buccinidae) in Japan and adjacent waters, with description of three new species. Venus 67(3-4): 145-157 * Fraussen, K. (2010). Buccinidae checklist. Pers. Com ==External links== * Category:Buccinidae Category:Gastropods described in 2009
title: Bathybuccinum yadai
